title: Short Stuff: The History of Paternity Testing
itunes:title: Short Stuff: The History of Paternity Testing
description:
Paternity testing. It wasn't science for many years, yet they still tried to do it. Learn all about it in 12 minutes.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
